item.description:
Please join us for a 2013 RED SOX NATIVES EXCLUSIVE EVENT! 

All groups are invited to cross post this optional event to watch games with other fans. All posting groups are required to have an Organizer or Event Host attend to greet it's members. 

Join us at The North Star for an NFL Playoff Wild Card Weekend Game Viewing Party Doubleheader to watch Cincinnati at Houston and Minnesota at Green Bay on Saturday, January 5. 

Come early at 4:00pm to get yourself a prime seat and enjoy some pre-game socializing.

Game Time is 4:30pm and 8:00pm.

There is no event fee for our reserved section. 

Stay for one, two, or parts of both games or leave when ever. 

The Red Sox Natives have been organizing weekly Patriots viewing parties over the last  2 years with guests from several other invited groups attending. We have had a blast with up to 80 people attending at various locations in Boston, Woburn and Wakefield.

The North Star will be our Home for watching 2013 New England Patriots and NFL Playoff Games for the 2013 Playoffs through the Super Bowl! For more information on the venue go to www.northstarboston.com. 

Jeff will welcome you to The North Star with Cornhole to add to the Tailgate feel. 

The North Star is super conveniently located next to the TD Garden and on the Green and Orange Lines and Commuter Rail at North Station. The Red and Blue Lines are within a 10 minute walk and street parking is also available if you arrive early.

Everyone is responsible for their own food and drinks. PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER AND TIP YOUR SERVER. Credit Cards will be collected by the North Star staff.

Space is limited.

We hope to see you there.

Red Sox Natives Team
item.how_to_find_us: Jeff has reserved a large section for us and other groups. Ask the hostess to direct you to The Red Sox Natives section.
item.name: NFL Playoff Wild Card Weekend Game Viewing Party at The North Star
